input.sentences: this was our captain for the day !
fun and drinks with the couple we met
and of course our beautiful view !
output.sentences: John and Mary are very excited to be going on a river cruise.
With everyone on board, the captain is ready to launch.
The beautiful weather and calm seas made the ride very enjoyable.
During the cruise, John and Mary had fun meeting new friends over drinks.
The views were beautiful and they took lots of pictures to remember their trip.
